channel.title: Upgrade on tenbulls blog
channel.description: Recent content in Upgrade on tenbulls blog

item.title: Remember your OS when upgrading to SQL 2012
item.description: Probably as far back as the end of last year when I first started putting material together for my Enter the Dragon and Moves like Jagger presentations and giving very early mash up presentations of them combined together, I started emphasising one very important upgrade consideration which is very often ignored. It is also a fact that is quite nicely touched upon by Glenn Berry (twitter|blog) in his excellent book SQL Server Hardware and if you have yet to discover its unique delights then I strongly advise you to check it out.
